query:
WITH ranked_users AS (
                SELECT 
                    id,
                    public_key,
                    created_at,
                    total_score,
                    ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY total_score DESC, created_at) as rank
                FROM beta_applicants_leaderboard
            )
            SELECT id, public_key, created_at, total_score, rank 
            FROM ranked_users WHERE public_key = $1
